name: TurretWar
description:
In this real time action strategy multiplayer game you must create turrets to destroy the enemy bases and protect your base from the enemy turrets.
Throw granades to defeat masses of enemy turrets and spawn ufos to re-program the enemy turrets to destroy the enemy with his own weapons.

Controls:

WASD: Move the player.

Left Mouse Button: Shoot

Right Mouse Button: Drag a rectangle around your turrets to select the turrets. Then click with the left mouse button to move the turrets.

Number keys: Use the buttons on the top to craete turrets or use items.
